Welcome back Bruce.  You dont know me, Im new...but wanted to say welcome back anyways =)
  

bhali333 <bhali333@...> wrote:
          
Hi Everyone,

It is good to be back, I've been busy during my sabatical.
So I have posted 2 files from each box. My folder in the files section 
is labeled bruces box files, inside are sub folders for each different 
box.

I am looking forward to getting back to helping and teaching what I 
know about the research to all the new people.

If anyone has any questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

Bruce

Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
